full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Project Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier to provide a new mini excavator to Parks Canada Agency (PC), specifically for use in Riding Mountain National Park, Winnipeg, Manitoba.

## Requirements
The contractor must deliver a mini excavator that meets the specified requirements, which includes:

* Supply and delivery of a new mini excavator
* Compliance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Solicitation Information
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contract Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Reference Number**: WS4042805852-Doc4046181955
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4042805852
* **Publication Date**: June 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 13, 2023 at 14:00:00 (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 5, 2024

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Douglas Rachinski (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: douglas.rachinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16666223?extsite=MTY2NjYyMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16666223?extsite=MTY2NjYyMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Tender Description**: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 13, 2023 at 1400 EDT. All bids submitted after 1400 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Parks Canada Agency in Riding Mountain National Park, Wasagaming, Manitoba has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a new mini excavator.
